attributes.additional_details:
I am a school student who is growing up and getting an education in an internet era, an era which will be long lasting and is vital for our development. I am currently studying A-Levels and my education is being hindered by a policy which has blocked my school accounts internet usage. This block has stopped me from doing research for case studies, exams and more and is sure to impact my grades.
This blocking of students internet should not be permitted without a valid reason, in my case and many others across the country this was not the case.
